name: Get random GIF using GIPHY and send them by email from Google Forms responses
description: Every time a Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically translate a word to a Gif image using GIPHY and send it in an email. This example uses the spreadsheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KytET6Ql0u9ogzaERz24YrLQEusOn7Iwa8dN6B0dFNY/edit#gid=964126193).
